title: Kentucky Fried Chicken restaurant being used as a clinic in Mīdān al-Taḥrīr
description: Art work is visible on the outer walls of the restaurant. Photographer's description: Protestors before & after Mubarak and how they show happy, photos of Ahmed Shafik speaking at his place. Text in image:  عيادة. Translation of Text in image: Clinic.
subject-lcsh: Demonstrations; Egypt; Medical care; Protest movements; Revolutions
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
source: From: Kentucky Fried Chicken restaurant being used as a clinic in Mīdān al-Taḥrīr
